Package de.oth.blocklib.shadows

Class ShadowBounds

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.shadows.ShadowBounds
public class ShadowBounds
extends java.lang.Object
Calculates the bounds that need to be covered by the shadow map.
Author:
Marc Ebbinger WS17/18

    • updateMaxDistance

      private void updateMaxDistance​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector4f nearLowerLeft, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector4f farUpperRight, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector4f farLowerLeft)
      Recalculates the maximum distance between two corners of the view frustum. The result is capped at 1.5 times the size of the loaded world, so that the whole world can still be shadowed.
